ContactId.description: ID of the account associated with this contact contact relationship.

EndDate.description: The date when the relationship ends.

HierarchyType.description: Indicates the type of association to determine the hierarchy of relationship between the two parties.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the contact is actively involved with the related contact.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, the user might have only accessed this record or list view (<parmname>LastReferencedDate</parmname>) but not viewed it.

Name.description: Name of the contact contact relationship.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

RelatedContactId.description: The related contact in the relationship.

RelatedInverseRecordId.description: The record that specifies the inverse relationship between the contacts.

StartDate.description: The date when the relationship starts.
